title: Per Diem Nurse
description: Per Diem Nurse  Job Number Full/Part Time  Schedule  Salary 201903280041  .43% Part Time  8AM - 5PM  $108,221 - $108,221 Position Information The overall purpose of the Per Diem Nurse is to provide patient care in general and complex cases, which requires the exercise of professional judgment. This requires the recognition of non-routine patient care situations, which have less predictable outcomes. The Per Diem Nurse will provide assistance to the doctors and leadership to the medical assistants.<br /><br />This recruitment will be for three per diem positions up to 43% appointment. <br /><br />This is a one year per diem position, with the possibility of extension based on available funding at the time.<br /> Minimum Requirements Possession of the legal requirements to practice as a Registered Nurse as determined by the California Board of Registered Nursing and six months of clinical experience.<br /> <br />Ability to relate well with patients and staff as a provider of health information, with an ability to teach health related classes or make health presentations in a variety of settings<br /> <br />Ability to work independently and in compliance with policies, protocols, and procedures of UCR.<br /> <br />Flexibility in working with a variety of ethnic, religious, and life-style backgrounds in a non-judgmental manner.<br /> <br />Skills and knowledge to perform: emergency triage, use of 02 tank, liquid nitrogen, EKG, IV therapy, spirometry, audiometry, autoclave, ear lavage, fax machine, and computer.<br /> <br />Ability to administer immunizations, antigens, and other medications via oral, intravenous, subcutaneous, intradermal, or intramuscular.<br /> <br />Ability to provide/perform various types of dressing applications and changes, assisting with laceration repair or minor surgeries.<br /><br />Ability to read, write, and correctly define medical terminology.<br /> <br />Ability to stand for long periods of time. Ability to lift and move 40 pounds. Appropriate manual dexterity to perform job tasks and duties safely and accurately.  Preferred Qualifications College/University Health Experience<br /> <br />Womens Health and Contraceptive Management: Implant, OCP, IUD, LARC Additional Information In the Heart of Inland Southern California, UC Riverside is located on nearly 1,200 acres near Box Springs Mountain in Southern California; the park-like campus provides convenient access to the vibrant and growing Inland region.
